website_summaries.verdict: A reliable eyelash serum that can also be used to enhance brows.
pros: Formulated with nourishing ingredients that help grow and strengthen both eyelashes and eyebrows
Some users also report darker lashes/brows after use
cons: The most expensive lash serum on our shortlist
Has mixed reviews – while some users were happy with the results, others reported no improvements after several months

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed at how much my brows have grown in after ...
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! I am an older woman and have very sparse brows. I am amazed at how much my brows have grown in after years of too much tweezing. The product is a little pricey but the tube lasts a while. It took about a month for me to see the difference in my brows. I just bought my second tube and am able to apply it about every three days now that my brows are fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seeing results!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second tube of neuLash Brow Enhancing Serum. I got great results from the first but because of the price decided to try a less expensive brand which has the same ingredient responsible for stimulating brow growth. I used the cheaper brand for a few months but, not only did it not work, I lost the good results I got from neuLash. I will definitely stick with neuLash since it's worth the price in terms of the results it gives. Also it takes ages to finish the tube with 2x a day application.
customer_reviews.author: Bellissima

customer_reviews.title: This product is a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer. I had have naturally thick brows but due to overplucking when I was younger, the hair doesn’t grow as full or thick at the tops. This product redefined my brows and reversed the damage of overplucking. I saw results in about a month’s time now I continue to purchase the product as maintenance. I have strangers stop me and tell me I have great eyebrows. This product is definitely one of my favorites and highly recommended! It’s a bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: My eyebrows look like they are in their 20’s
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows look like they are in their 20’s.....the hair grew in thick and they look darker too. I dont use any eyebrow pencil anymore and have to actually trim them now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, after going through several rounds of chemo her eyebrows barely came back. I tried this on whim when it was on sale from Groupon. It might be expensive but it works! Her eyebrows returned fuller then they had ever been. I would recommend this to anyone. The only downside is you must continue to use it, but once they grow back you don't have to use it everyday. She uses it every 3 days and they have still remained just as full. Thank you for making an amazing product that helps my mom feel beautiful again.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel II

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works with no adverse side effects. My eyebrows have filled in and are as full as I would like them to be.
customer_reviews.author: La Contessa

customer_reviews.title: Works as they say awesome
customer_reviews.text: Actually regrew a huge missing part of my eyebrow I didn’t think it was possible when the lady ripped off half of my eyebrow w wax but it worked
customer_reviews.author: TaTyana

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came super fast, great price & wonderful product. It works great!!! I feel better about my eyebrows now!! I accidentally tweezed a little too munch one time a few years ago and it never grew back and this stuff has definitely helped!! Thank you soo much!!
customer_reviews.author: Summergirl87

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went through an entire bottle. Did not notice enough of a difference to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara N

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. I have even ordered it again. I followed the instructions applying twice dailey and the results are truly amazing! I was skeptical at first but I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: NeuLash brow enhancer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first serum from Neiman Marcus and it actually worked very well. The serum I purchased on line did not preform the same... or at all....I don't believe it is the same serum. I will purchase the serum again but from Neiman's.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Huenefeldt

customer_reviews.title: expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I used this and it produced fairly good results. It didn't fill in my missing brow area from a childhood accident, but helped the other hairs grow. I thought it was fine until I read you have to keep using it in order to keep the results. Too expensive for that! So I did some research and the active ingredient in this stuff is used because it produces the same effect as minoxidil. PROBLEM SOLVED! go buy some topical 2% minoxidil for eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe how my eyelashes are proliferating! Am tempted to use it on my scalp!
customer_reviews.author: adnil

customer_reviews.title: FAKE / BUY AT NORDSTROM
customer_reviews.text: FAKE/COUNTERFEIT! So disappointed to have spent $100 and the product didn’t make a difference at all! Please save your money and buy the AUTHENTIC one at Nordstrom!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Made Hair Thicker
customer_reviews.text: Made the hair I already had thicker/darker. Minimal new growth, but appreciating the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a product to grow eyelashes, so color is not a factor. The product worked.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Thank you neuBrow Lab-Rats!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I am 61 years young and had only 2 small patches of hair over each brow. After 4 weeks both brows started to filled in nicely with healthy hair. Thank you neuBrow Lab-Rats!!! Your product is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's cause my eyebrows are already thick... but my lil scarce hairs aren't growing back....
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but, after four weeks, my brows are thicker and longer. I barely need eye brow pencil now. It is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: beanster

customer_reviews.title: Skin sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin I would advise not to use. My skin started peeling and felt a burning sensation after only a drop. Photos attached
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H.

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: best eyebrow serum I have tried hands down- over anythinh at sephora or librow or other online/foreign brands- my eyebrows look great
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Moorad

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as well as I hoped, my eyebrows do seem a tad longer but not thicker - not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Strempel

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It takes quite a while--at least a month or more to start working--so don't give up prematurely. But the eyebrows really do fill in again and darken a bit as well, so long as you keep using it 2x per day. And not very much product is needed at each application. I have tried other products over the years without success, but was very pleased with Neubrow.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Knox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for face, thoroughly recommended, long and bushy eyebrows for a better look and presentation, excellent product neulash neubrow.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Agudelo

customer_reviews.title: Success with neuBrow
customer_reviews.text: Product very successful for encouraging the brows to grow, slowly. I do want to see the long term results, but so far very good.
customer_reviews.author: marianne hovivian

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really good for having longer, darker thicker eyebrows. I actually like Neulash (for lashes) better for a great product, but this is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: the price is good
customer_reviews.text: It's cheaper than Neiman's and I haven't tried it yet, but I'm assuming it's exactly as effective or you will be hearing back from me!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Yes you have to continue to use long term but for the first three months i used twice daily and I had people comment on my brows and I had not told anyone I was using in case it did not work. After the first 3 months I went down to once a day and now I use once a day in the evening 4 times a week and they still look great. I have a lot of grey in my brows so I had them tinted and all I can say is WOW!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This was a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of money. There has been no sign of any sort of eyebrow growth. If I could have, I would have given this product 0 stars. It feels like the company is preying on women who have lost their eyebrows due to age or to chemotherapy and are desperate for some sort of fix. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M. Rees

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product did absolutely nothing for my eyebrows. I followed the instructions precisely. I'm super disappointed considering how much I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Colton

customer_reviews.title: Gives results.
customer_reviews.text: Gives results. Purchased for my mum and she is very pleased with the results. She has tried many alternative brands for cheaper prices but none work as well as this. We have repurchased a couple of times and will continue to do so for the foreseeable future. Amazon sometimes has it for a cheaper price than other vendors so grab it if you see it for under $100. Would definitely recommend to anyone trying to grow out their brows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I started using neuLash and neuBrow about 4-5 weeks ago, and both have worked very well for me. Yes, the products are expensive, but with such great results, I don't mind! I had very thin brows due to over-plucking, along with a few areas that were somewhat bare, and they have all filled in nicely. Be warned: you have to be patient. I didn't see much for a while and then they noticeably started to grow. My lashes have gotten much better. I'm very happy with the results for both these products, and I recommend trying them if you have thinning brows/lashes. Both products are easy to use. I plan to keep using them indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: malfoyfan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that works
customer_reviews.text: After 2 to 3 months, sparse eyebrows were filled in much more. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Leigh

customer_reviews.title: It does works!
customer_reviews.text: Big big thx to that people who made this serum. I have really great results!!! Definitely gonna buy it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I began to lose my eyebrows due to over plucking in my youth. I heard about this product from my hair stylist. It really works. I now have fuller, thicker, darker eyebrows where there were NONE! You must use the product twice a day at first. Once the hair starts to grow, you can back off to even three times a week. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

product_meta.title: Skin Research Laboratories NeuBrow Enhancing Serum
product_meta.description:
neuBROW from Skin Research Laboratories, is a potent serum formulated with an exclusive Dual-Weight Protein Complex that replenishes and protects the brows, promoting strength suppleness and shine. It delivers fuller-looking, more defined eyebrows in three to four weeks. Formulated with moisturizing Keratin to support sparse, undernourished and aging brows.

BRAND STORY
Skin Research Laboratories is committed to its mission of creating and developing leading-edge beauty treatments that deliver on their promise. No miracles. Just clinically-proven solutions.
